title: Japan exports rise more than expected in October, rebounding from 43-month low
content: Japan's trade deficit expanded to 461.2 billion yen ($2.98 billion), compared to September's revised figure of 294.1 billion yen.
summary: Japan's trade deficit expanded to 461.2 billion yen ($2.98 billion), compared to September's revised figure of 294.1 billion yen.

title: Comcast will announce the spinoff of cable networks Wednesday, sources say
content: Comcast is planning to announce the spinoff of its cable networks, including CNBC, MSNBC and E!, on Wednesday, according to a source familiar with the matter.
summary: Comcast is planning to announce the spinoff of its cable networks, including CNBC, MSNBC and E!, on Wednesday, according to a source familiar with the matter.

title: U.S. 'industrial renaissance' is fueling a rebound in fundraising, Apollo CEO Marc Rowan says
content: Capital raising activity is set for a rebound in the U.S. amid a global "industrial renaissance," Oaktree Capital Management Co-Chairman Howard Marks says.
summary: Capital raising activity is set for a rebound in the U.S. amid a global "industrial renaissance," Oaktree Capital Management Co-Chairman Howard Marks says.

title: China expectedly keeps benchmark lending rates steady as Beijing assesses stimulus measures
content: The People's Bank of China said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate at 3.1%, while holding the five-year LPR at 3.6%.
summary: The People's Bank of China said it would keep the one-year loan prime rate at 3.1%, while holding the five-year LPR at 3.6%.

title: Seven & i shares surge on report its founding family is raising over $50 billion to take the firm private
content: NHK said the founding family will raise over 8 trillion yen from "three Japanese megabanks and major American financial institutions."
summary: NHK said the founding family will raise over 8 trillion yen from "three Japanese megabanks and major American financial institutions."

title: Trump tariffs to push down U.S. growth 'a great deal' going into 2026, Morgan Stanley warns
content: Donald Trump's proposed tariffs will dent U.S. economic growth going into 2026, said Morgan Stanley's chief global economist Seth Carpenter.
summary: Donald Trump's proposed tariffs will dent U.S. economic growth going into 2026, said Morgan Stanley's chief global economist Seth Carpenter.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Anticipation over Nvidia’s earnings overshadows geopolitical risks
content: Investors briefly sought refuge in safe haven assets on increased geopolitical tensions. But they decided other factors were more important to the markets.
summary: Investors briefly sought refuge in safe haven assets on increased geopolitical tensions. But they decided other factors were more important to the markets.

title: Qualcomm says it expects $4 billion in PC chip sales by 2029, as company gets traction beyond smartphones
content: Qualcomm said on Tuesday that it expects its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion per year by 2029.
summary: Qualcomm said on Tuesday that it expects its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion per year by 2029.

title: Thailand legalizing same-sex marriage is likely to bring a flood of tourists
content: Thailand's same-sex marriage law could add 4 million tourists and $2 billion in tourism revenue per year, according to a report commissioned by Agoda.
summary: Thailand's same-sex marriage law could add 4 million tourists and $2 billion in tourism revenue per year, according to a report commissioned by Agoda.

title: Rafael Nadal has made $134 million in career prize money, will retire as No. 2 highest-earning tennis player ever
content: The 38-year-old's career earnings are surpassed only by Novak Djokovic's.
summary: The 38-year-old's career earnings are surpassed only by Novak Djokovic's.

title: Russia says Ukraine attacked it using U.S. long-range missiles, signals it's ready for nuclear response
content: Russia has signaled to the West it's ready for a nuclear confrontation.
summary: Russia has signaled to the West it's ready for a nuclear confrontation.

title: SpaceX completes sixth Starship flight, splashes down both booster and spacecraft
content: SpaceX launched its sixth Starship test flight to date on Tuesday.
summary: SpaceX launched its sixth Starship test flight to date on Tuesday.

title: Market veteran Howard Marks cautions that China's economic growth target is a 'Herculean challenge'
content: Veteran investor Howard Marks is hopeful about China's economy, but cautions that the country's growth target is a monumental challenge.
summary: Veteran investor Howard Marks is hopeful about China's economy, but cautions that the country's growth target is a monumental challenge.

title: Doubts mount over Britain’s ambitious growth plans — with warnings of further tax rises possible
content: Doubts are mounting over the Labour government's flagship growth and investment agenda, with one analyst warning further tax rises could be on the horizon.
summary: Doubts are mounting over the Labour government's flagship growth and investment agenda, with one analyst warning further tax rises could be on the horizon.

title: Russia-U.S. tensions briefly hit global markets as Putin lowers the threshold for a nuclear strike
content: Stocks briefly fell and investors fled to safe haven assets on Tuesday, as global markets reacted to escalating tensions between the world's two largest nuclear powers.
summary: Stocks briefly fell and investors fled to safe haven assets on Tuesday, as global markets reacted to escalating tensions between the world's two largest nuclear powers.

title: Trump picks Dr. Oz to lead massive Medicare and Medicaid agency CMS
content: Dr. Mehmet Oz previously ran for a Senate seat from Pennsylvania. CMS is one of the biggest agencies in the U.S. government, overseeing Medicare and Medicaid.
summary: Dr. Mehmet Oz previously ran for a Senate seat from Pennsylvania. CMS is one of the biggest agencies in the U.S. government, overseeing Medicare and Medicaid.

title: A double whammy of tariffs and strikes is coming for U.S. trade and the global supply chain in early 2025
content: Shippers and logistics companies are gaming out a complex early 2025 as President Trump may implement new tariffs as East, Gulf Coast ports start new strike.
summary: Shippers and logistics companies are gaming out a complex early 2025 as President Trump may implement new tariffs as East, Gulf Coast ports start new strike.

title: Trump attends SpaceX Starship launch in Texas with CEO Elon Musk
content: President-elect Donald Trump attended a SpaceX launch in Texas with CEO Elon Musk, whom he tapped to oversee a government efficiency commission.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump attended a SpaceX launch in Texas with CEO Elon Musk, whom he tapped to oversee a government efficiency commission.

title: Bitcoin rises to a new record as investors absorb growing Ukraine-Russia tensions
content: Bitcoin moved higher Tuesday amid rising geopolitical tensions between Ukraine and Russia.
summary: Bitcoin moved higher Tuesday amid rising geopolitical tensions between Ukraine and Russia.

title: Walmart may have to raise some prices if Trump tariffs take effect, CFO says
content: The discounter's comments are the latest warning from retail leaders about the potential impact of the tariffs.
summary: The discounter's comments are the latest warning from retail leaders about the potential impact of the tariffs.

title: You could 'escape from reality' and cruise around the world until 2028—if you have at least $40,000/year to spend
content: Villa Vie Residences announced the launch of its Tour La Vie program, starting at $40,000 a year.
summary: Villa Vie Residences announced the launch of its Tour La Vie program, starting at $40,000 a year.

title: European tech funding declines for third consecutive year — but the sector is finally stabilizing
content: VC investment in European startups is projected to decline for a third straight year, according to Atomico — but there are signs things are finally stabilizing.
summary: VC investment in European startups is projected to decline for a third straight year, according to Atomico — but there are signs things are finally stabilizing.

title: Microsoft introduces PC that has one job: connect users to their computers in the cloud
content: Microsoft's latest stripped-down device is designed for corporate use and includes a new operating system.

title: Germany's Thyssenkrupp pops 10% after narrowing net loss and booking $1 billion impairment charge
content: Thyssenkrupp on Tuesday reported a 1-billion-euro ($1 billion) impairment on its struggling steel division.
summary: Thyssenkrupp on Tuesday reported a 1-billion-euro ($1 billion) impairment on its struggling steel division.

title: Walmart hikes its outlook again as shoppers spend more outside the grocery aisles
content: The discounter will deliver its latest sales results as inflation cools and the holiday season heats up.
summary: The discounter will deliver its latest sales results as inflation cools and the holiday season heats up.

title: Lowe's beats on earnings and hikes guidance, but still expects sales to fall this year
content: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.
summary: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.

title: Fintech unicorns are watching Klarna's debut for signs of when IPO window will reopen
content: Financial technology unicorns aren't in a rush to go public even after buy now, pay later firm Klarna filed for a U.S. IPO.
summary: Financial technology unicorns aren't in a rush to go public even after buy now, pay later firm Klarna filed for a U.S. IPO.

title: China's vice premier vows to boost Hong Kong competitiveness, says stimulus push has 'benefited' the city

title: CNBC Daily Open: Tesla helps the Nasdaq snap its losing streak
content: Tesla helped the S&P achieve its first winning day in three and the Nasdaq break its four-day losing streak, despite Nvidia dropping 1.3%.
summary: Tesla helped the S&P achieve its first winning day in three and the Nasdaq break its four-day losing streak, despite Nvidia dropping 1.3%.

title: China is doubling down on Latin America ties to bolster influence and trade, experts say
content: China President Xi Jinping last week inaugurated a $3.5 billion megaport, majority-owned by China state shipping company Cosco, during a trip to Peru.
summary: China President Xi Jinping last week inaugurated a $3.5 billion megaport, majority-owned by China state shipping company Cosco, during a trip to Peru.
